original_body_lines: Since celebrating their centenary, last year, with mega events abroad, organised by the Old Boys’ Associations, around the globe, the Peterites still continue to be very active.
This time the focus is on the Welfare Society of St. Peter’s College, Colombo 04 (Bambalapitiya), and they have decided to move into action with an event called ‘Wild West’.
The organisers refer to it as ‘A Night Till Dawn’, and it will be held on 29th July at the Golden Rose, Boralesgamuwa.

‘Wild West’ will feature the bands Misty and Genesis, as well as Dinesh Subasinghe, Clifford Richards, Frank David, Shawn Groove, Mazo, Ricardo Deen and the crooner everyone is talking about these days – Janaka Palapathwala, now known as JPal.
The entertainment lineup is very impressive, indeed, and that means there will be non-stop action, right throughout the night…till dawn.
You could obtain more details by calling Shanik (0773930716), Micheal (0710376278) or Shehan (0778087547).
